item.title: 加拿大表示已完成与台湾的双边投资协议谈判
item.description:
Canada and Taiwan have completed talks on a bilateral deal to boost foreign investment and will work to make sure it comes into effect promptly, Canadian Trade Minister Mary Ng said in a statement on Tuesday.

加拿大贸易部长吴玛丽周二在一份声明中表示，加拿大和台湾已经完成了一项旨在促进外国投资的双边协议的谈判，并将努力确保该协议迅速生效。

The Foreign Investment Promotion and Protection Arrangement is part of Canada's plan to increase trade and influence in the fast-growing Indo-Pacific region.

《外国投资促进和保护安排》是加拿大在快速增长的印太地区增加贸易和影响力计划的一部分。

Trade between Canada and Taiwan totaled C$10.2 billion in 2021, up from C$7.4 billion in 2020, according to official Canadian figures. Canada's total bilateral trade with the world is more than C$1.5 trillion.

根据加拿大官方数据，2021 年加拿大与台湾之间的贸易总额为 102 亿加元，高于 2020 年的 74 亿加元。加拿大与世界的双边贸易总额超过1.5万亿加元。

China, which views self-governing Taiwan as its own territory, has sour relations with Canada. Taiwan strongly rejects China's sovereignty claims.

中国将自治台湾视为自己的领土，与加拿大关系紧张。台湾强烈反对中国的主权主张。

The Chinese embassy in Ottawa did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

中国驻渥太华大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

Reporting by David Ljunggren; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama

item.title: 世贸组织总干事：在下一次重要会议上，我们正走在达成贸易协议的“正确道路”上
item.description:
The head of the World Trade Organization on Tuesday voiced optimism that trade deals could be reached at the next major ministerial meeting in February 2024.

世界贸易组织负责人周二对 2024 年 2 月举行的下一次重要部长级会议上达成贸易协议表示乐观。

More than 1,000 trade officials are meeting in Geneva this week to try to advance negotiations ahead of a meeting in the United Arab Emirates next year where deals are being sought on fisheries and WTO reforms, among other topics.

1000多名贸易官员本周在日内瓦举行会议，试图在明年在阿拉伯联合酋长国举行的会议之前推进谈判，会上将就渔业和世贸组织改革等议题寻求达成协议。

"All in all it was a positive meeting. Dare I say it lifted my spirits that we are on the right path to achieving the deliverables," WTO Director-General Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala told a press conference, adding that discussions on fisheries and dispute settlement reforms had been the most promising.

世贸组织总干事恩戈齐·奥孔乔-伊韦阿拉在新闻发布会上表示：“总而言之，这是一次积极的会议。我敢说，我们正走在实现可交付成果的正确道路上，这让我精神振奋。”他补充说，有关渔业和争端的讨论定居点改革是最有希望的。

WTO members reached a historic package of deals in June 2022 including a ban on some fishing subsidies that has the potential to reverse collapsing fish stocks. However, only part of the deal was finalised and negotiations continue.

世贸组织成员于 2022 年 6 月达成了一项历史性的一揽子协议，其中包括禁止某些渔业补贴，这有可能扭转鱼类资源崩溃的局面。然而，该交易仅敲定了部分内容，谈判仍在继续。

"It is clearly our ambition to conclude the negotiations by December," the talks' chair Ambassador Einar Gunnarsson of Iceland told Reuters earlier on Tuesday, saying senior officials had communicated a "strong commitment" to advance.

周二早些时候，谈判主席、冰岛大使埃纳尔·古纳松 (Einar Gunnarsson) 对路透社表示：“显然，我们的目标是在 12 月之前完成谈判。”他表示，高级官员已表达了推进谈判的“坚定承诺”。

WTO members are also trying to agree on reform proposals to its trade dispute system which has been only partially functional since U.S. opposition to judge appointments paralysed its top court in December 2019.

世贸组织成员还试图就其贸易争端制度的改革提案达成一致，自2019年12月美国反对法官任命导致其最高法院瘫痪以来，该制度仅部分发挥作用。

Reporting by Emma Farge; Editing by Chris Reese and Jonathan Oatis

item.title: ASMI 在中国业务的推动下超额完成收入目标
item.description:
Semiconductor equipment manufacturer ASM International (ASMI.AS) beat its third-quarter revenue guidance Tuesday, with a strong contribution from the Chinese market.

半导体设备制造商 ASM International (ASMI.AS)周二超出了其第三季度收入预期，这得益于中国市场的强劲贡献。

The Dutch group reported 622.3 million euros ($659.14 million) in revenue during the quarter, against an initial target of between 580 and 620 million euros.

该荷兰集团报告本季度收入为 6.223 亿欧元（6.5914 亿美元），而最初目标为 5.80 至 6.2 亿欧元。

ASMI's third-quarter revenue is up from 609.8 million euros last year and above the 601.92 million euros expected by analysts, according to LSEG data.

LSEG数据显示，ASMI第三季度营收较去年的6.098亿欧元有所增长，也高于分析师预期的6.0192亿欧元。

“ASM delivered robust results amidst continued soft market conditions,” president and chief executive Benjamin Loh said in a statement, adding that "the timing and strength of recovery is still uncertain."

总裁兼首席执行官 Benjamin Loh 在一份声明中表示：“在市场环境持续疲软的情况下，ASM 取得了强劲的业绩。”他补充说，“复苏的时机和力度仍不确定。”

New orders came in at 627.4 million euros, below last year's 675.5 million euros but near the top-end of the group's guidance for the quarter.

新订单额为 6.274 亿欧元，低于去年的 6.755 亿欧元，但接近该集团本季度指引的上限。

Fellow Dutch semiconductor equipment maker ASML Holding NV (ASML.AS) last week reported lower-than-expected orders in the third quarter and warned of flat sales in 2024.

荷兰半导体设备制造商 ASML Holding NV (ASML.AS)上周公布第三季度订单低于预期，并警告 2024 年销售将持平。

Chinese and U.S. restrictions on chip exports and lackluster sales figures on mobile and PC markets have led to uncertainty in the sector.

中国和美国对芯片出口的限制以及移动和个人电脑市场销售数据的低迷导致了该行业的不确定性。

ASMI does not expect "any material additional impact" from the latest update on restrictions announced by the U.S. last week.

ASMI 预计美国上周宣布的最新限制措施不会产生“任何重大额外影响”。

Jefferies analysts see the company "more than compensating" any losses from the restrictions with gains from a sector-wide turn to new technology.

杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 分析师认为，该公司通过全行业转向新技术获得的收益“足以弥补”限制措施带来的任何损失。

The Dutch group is well-positioned to benefit from growing demand for gate-all-around transistors, which allow for finer control over the flow of current and lower energy consumption, and single-wafer atomic layer deposition (ALD), a manufacturing technique using ultra-thin layers of material.

该荷兰集团处于有利地位，可以从对环栅晶体管不断增长的需求中受益，环栅晶体管可以更好地控制电流流动并降低能耗，以及单晶圆原子层沉积（ALD），这是一种使用超薄层材料。

Loh says the group expects the first "meaningful" orders for GAA transistors to come in the next quarter.

Loh 表示，该集团预计第一批“有意义”的 GAA 晶体管订单将在下个季度到来。

Taiwan's TSMC, the world's largest contract chipmaker and an ASMI client, Intel and Samsung are amongst chipmakers with plans to adopt GAA and ALD technologies.

全球最大的合约芯片制造商、ASMI 客户台湾台积电、英特尔和三星等芯片制造商均计划采用 GAA 和 ALD 技术。

($1 = 0.9441 euros)

（1 美元 = 0.9441 欧元）

Reporting by Victor Goury-Laffont; Editing by Alison Williams, Mark Potter and Andrea Ricci

item.title: 布林肯表示将与中国王毅合作遏制中东紧张局势
item.description:
U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken told the UN Security Council on Tuesday that he will work with China's top diplomat Wang Yi to prevent the conflict in the Middle East from spreading when they meet later this week.

美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周二在联合国安理会表示，他将与中国最高外交官王毅在本周晚些时候会晤时合作，防止中东冲突蔓延。

Blinken called on the 15-member council to help contain the conflict, amid soaring tensions after Palestinian militant group Hamas' attacks on Israel on Oct. 7.

10 月 7 日巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯袭击以色列后紧张局势加剧，布林肯呼吁由 15 名成员组成的委员会帮助遏制冲突。

"Members of this council, and permanent members in particular, have a special responsibility to prevent this conflict from spreading," Blinken said, warning Iran and its proxies in the region not to open up more fronts in the war.

布林肯说：“安理会成员，特别是常任理事国，负有防止这场冲突蔓延的特殊责任。”他警告伊朗及其在该地区的代理人不要在战争中开辟更多战线。

"I look forward to continuing to work with my counterpart from the People's Republic of China to do precisely that, when he visits Washington later this week."

“我期待着在中华人民共和国外长本周晚些时候访问华盛顿时继续与他合作，以实现这一目标。”

Wang is set to arrive in the United States on Thursday for talks with Blinken and President Joe Biden's national security advisor Jake Sullivan, as Washington seeks to ensure the intense competition between the world's two largest economies and their disagreements over a host of issues from trade to Taiwan and the South China Sea does not veer into conflict.

王毅将于周四抵达美国，与布林肯和总统乔·拜登的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文进行会谈，因为华盛顿寻求确保世界上最大的两个经济体之间的激烈竞争以及它们在贸易、金融和金融等一系列问题上的分歧。台湾和南海并没有陷入冲突。

U.S. officials also want Beijing to use its influence with Iran and other countries in the Middle East to help prevent the conflict from spreading.

美国官员还希望北京利用其对伊朗和中东其他国家的影响力来帮助防止冲突蔓延。

Israel's bombing and siege of Gaza in response to the Hamas attacks has stirred anger in Muslim-majority countries, and Washington fears an imminent ground offensive could spark a wider conflict.

以色列为回应哈马斯袭击而对加沙进行的轰炸和围困激起了穆斯林占多数的国家的愤怒，华盛顿担心迫在眉睫的地面进攻可能引发更广泛的冲突。

China has consistently called for restraint and a ceasefire in response to Israel's bombardment of Gaza, but has also sharpened its criticism of Israel.

针对以色列轰炸加沙，中国一贯呼吁克制和停火，但也加大了对以色列的批评力度。

Reporting by Michelle Nichols, Humeyra Pamuk and Simon Lewis, editing by Deepa Babington

米歇尔·尼科尔斯、胡梅拉·帕慕克和西蒙·刘易斯报道，迪帕·巴宾顿编辑

item.title: 欧盟建立新机制避免药品短缺
item.description:
The European Commission on Tuesday launched some short-term measures to prevent medicine shortages this winter and the next as a stop-gap while a proposed pharmaceutical rules overhaul is hashed out by the EU's key legislative arms.

欧盟委员会周二推出了一些短期措施，以防止今年冬天和明年冬天的药品短缺，作为权宜之计，同时欧盟主要立法部门正在讨论拟议的药品规则改革。

After the COVID-19 pandemic and ensuing medicine shortages due to supply chain bottlenecks, the Commission proposed the first major reform of its pharmaceutical regulations in April and hopes to forge a closer health union.

在 COVID-19 大流行以及随之而来的供应链瓶颈造成的药品短缺之后，欧盟委员会于 4 月份提出了对其药品法规的首次重大改革，并希望建立一个更紧密的健康联盟。

A key short-term move is the set up of a voluntary mechanism between member states to fill medicine gaps across the block this winter.

一项关键的短期举措是在成员国之间建立自愿机制，以填补今年冬天整个地区的药品缺口。

"The scheme allows Member States to flag needs for a given medicine in critical shortage at national level to other Member States, so that they can indicate the availability of stock that could be redistributed," a statement said.

一份声明称：“该计划允许成员国向其他成员国报告国家一级严重短缺的特定药品的需求，以便它们能够表明可以重新分配的库存情况。”

Further, the Commission is looking to set up a joint buying scheme for antibiotics and medicines for certain respiratory illnesses ahead of winter 2024-2025, it said.

此外，委员会还表示，正在寻求在 2024 年至 2025 年冬季之前制定针对某些呼吸道疾病的抗生素和药物的联合购买计划。

The EU's European Medicines Agency (EMA), together with member states, is also slowly narrowing down a list of critical medicines after calls from member states - including Belgium, France, Spain and Germany - to improve security of supply and come up with a Critical Medicines Act. The list will be finalised by the year-end.

在比利时、法国、西班牙和德国等成员国呼吁提高供应安全并制定关键药物清单后，欧盟欧洲药品管理局 (EMA) 正与成员国一起慢慢缩小关键药物清单。药品法。该名单将于年底前最终确定。

Once the medicine list is finalised, which currently has between 100-350 being debated, each one will go through a vulnerability assessment to see what is required and then dialogue with the industry on to ramp up output. Any measures taken on the list will be done by April next year.

目前正在讨论的药品清单有 100-350 种，一旦最终确定，每一种药品都将进行脆弱性评估，看看需要什么，然后与行业对话以提高产量。清单上采取的任何措施都将在明年四月之前完成。

Over the last decades, the EU has become heavily reliant on India and China for generic medicines and key ingredients after production was off-shored due to high levels of pollution in the bloc.

过去几十年来，由于欧盟的高污染水平，生产转移到海外，欧盟在仿制药和关键成分方面严重依赖印度和中国。

The EU will set up a Critical Medicines Alliance in early 2024, an embryonic version of a Critical Medicines Act, to develop coordination between the Commission, industry, civil society and national authorities on a short list of medications.

欧盟将于 2024 年初成立关键药物联盟，这是《关键药物法案》的雏形，旨在就简短的药物清单在委员会、行业、民间社会和国家当局之间开展协调。

The EU aims to reshore some production, broaden its sources of key ingredients, coordinate stockpiling as well as set up some pre-reserved production capacity in case of an emergency, such as during the COVID-19 pandemic.

欧盟的目标是将部分生产迁回国内，扩大关键原料的来源，协调库存，并建立一些预先储备的产能，以应对紧急情况，例如在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行期间。

Reporting by Julia Payne; editing by David Evans

item.title: 英伟达表示美国加快了对人工智能芯片的新出口限制
item.description:
Chip designer Nvidia (NVDA.O) said new U.S. export curbs on the sale of its high-end artificial intelligence chips to China came into effect on Monday as regulators advanced the deadline.

芯片设计商英伟达(NVDA.O)表示，随着监管机构提前截止日期，美国对其高端人工智能芯片向中国销售的新出口限制于周一生效。

The restrictions were supposed to come into play 30 days from Oct. 17 when the Biden administration unveiled measures to stop countries, including China, Iran and Russia, from receiving advanced AI chips designed by Nvidia and others.

这些限制原定于 10 月 17 日起 30 天后生效，当时拜登政府公布了阻止中国、伊朗和俄罗斯等国家接收英伟达等公司设计的先进人工智能芯片的措施。

Nvidia does not expect a near-term impact on its earnings from the move, it disclosed in a filing on Tuesday, but did not say why the U.S. government had accelerated the timing.

英伟达在周二的一份文件中披露，预计此举不会对其盈利产生短期影响，但没有说明美国政府为何加快这一进程。

Advanced Micro Devices (AMD.O), also impacted by the curbs, did not immediately respond to Reuters' requests for comment, while the U.S. Department of Commerce declined to comment.

同样受到限制措施影响的先进微设备公司（AMD.O）没有立即回应路透社的置评请求，而美国商务部则拒绝置评。

Intel (INTC.O), which began selling its Gaudi 2 chips in China in July, said it was "reviewing the regulations and assessing the potential impact."

英特尔(INTC.O)于 7 月开始在中国销售 Gaudi 2 芯片，并表示正在“审查相关规定并评估潜在影响”。

The restrictions bar exports of Nvidia's modified advanced AI chips A800 and H800 - both of which were created for the Chinese market to comply with previous export rules.

这些限制禁止出口英伟达经过修改的先进人工智能芯片 A800 和 H800，这两款芯片都是为中国市场而设计的，旨在遵守之前的出口规定。

The Nvidia A100, H100 and L40S chips are also impacted by the curbs.

Nvidia A100、H100 和 L40S 芯片也受到限制的影响。

Reporting by Aditya Soni in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur and Anil D'Silva

Aditya Soni 班加罗尔报道；编辑：Arun Koyyur 和 Anil D'Silva

item.title: 芬兰称天然气管道可能因船舶拖锚而断裂
item.description:
Damage to a Baltic Sea gas pipeline earlier this month is believed to have been caused by a ship dragging a large anchor along the seabed, but it was too early to tell if this was an accident or a deliberate act, Finnish police said on Tuesday.

芬兰警方周二表示，本月早些时候波罗的海天然气管道受损据信是由一​​艘船在海底拖动大锚造成的，但现在判断这是意外还是故意行为还为时过早。

Investigators said they had now retrieved a lost anchor from the seabed location where the pipeline ruptured on Oct. 8, and were investigating whether it belonged to a Chinese container vessel.

调查人员表示，他们现已从10月8日管道破裂的海底位置打捞出一根丢失的锚，并正在调查它是否属于一艘中国集装箱船。

Police have previously said damage to the Balticconnector subsea gas pipeline and two Baltic Sea telecoms cables was cause by external mechanical force and were investigating whether this was a case of sabotage or caused by accident.

警方此前曾表示，Balticconnector海底天然气管道和两条波罗的海电信电缆的损坏是由外部机械力造成的，正在调查这是一起破坏案件还是意外事故造成的。

Broad drag marks were seen on the seabed leading up to where the pipeline was broken, and the anchor was lying immediately after the damage spot. A narrower path was seen on the seabed stretching onwards for dozens of miles, police said.

在海底看到了宽阔的拖曳痕迹，一直延伸到管道破裂的地方，锚就位于损坏点之后。警方称，海底有一条狭窄的道路，向前延伸数十英里。

A piece of the anchor, one of its two spikes, had broken off, they added.

他们补充说，锚的一部分（两个尖刺之一）已经折断。

"The next questions are about whether it was intentional, negligence, poor seamanship, and that's where we get into whether there could be a motive for what's going on," National Bureau of Investigation (NBI) chief Robin Lardot told a press conference.

美国国家调查局（NBI）局长罗宾·拉尔多（Robin Lardot）在新闻发布会上表示：“接下来的问题是，这是否是故意、疏忽、航海技术不佳，这就是我们要调查所发生事件是否有动机的地方。”

"But it's too early to answer that at this stage," he added.

“但现阶段回答这个问题还为时过早，”他补充道。

The NBI on Friday said they were focusing their probe on the Chinese NewNew Polar Bear container vessel that had travelled above the pipeline and the cables at the time of the damage.

国调局周五表示，他们的调查重点是中国新新北极熊号集装箱船，该船在受损时曾行驶在管道和电缆上方。

The NBI on Tuesday said they had established that the NewNew Polar Bear was in fact missing one of its front anchors, and said they had tried unsuccessfully to contact the ship to ask whether this was the one retrieved in the Gulf of Finland.

国调局周二表示，他们已经确定“新新北极熊”号实际上丢失了一个前锚，并表示他们曾试图联系该船询问这是否是在芬兰湾打捞上来的锚，但没有成功。

China called on Monday for an "objective, fair and professional" investigation into the pipeline damage.

中国周一呼吁对管道损坏事件进行“客观、公正、专业”的调查。

The incident cut pipeline gas supplies to Finland, although the country expects to manage with imports of liquefied natural gas via ship deliveries to its Inkoo port.

该事件减少了对芬兰的管道天然气供应，尽管该国希望通过船舶运送到其因科港来管理液化天然气的进口。

As a result of the damage, NATO has stepped up patrols in the Baltic Sea.

由于这次破坏，北约加强了在波罗的海的巡逻。

In September 2022, the larger Nord Stream pipelines connecting Germany and Russia were damaged by explosions that authorities have said were deliberate acts of sabotage, although it is still unclear who was behind the attack.

2022 年 9 月，连接德国和俄罗斯的较大北溪管道因爆炸而受损，当局称这是蓄意破坏行为，但目前尚不清楚谁是袭击的幕后黑手。

item.title: 成本削减和价格上涨推动 3M 上调全年利润预期
item.description:
3M Co (MMM.N) on Tuesday raised its full-year adjusted profit forecast and reported upbeat quarterly earnings, as the diversified manufacturer was able to offset slow demand with price hikes and cost savings, sending its shares up over 5%.

3M Co (MMM.N)周二上调了全年调整后利润预测，并报告了乐观的季度收益，因为这家多元化制造商能够通过提价和节省成本来抵消需求放缓的影响，导致其股价上涨超过 5%。

3M hiked prices to offset high raw material and labor costs, and undertook a workforce reduction amid waning demand for consumer electronics.

3M 提高了价格以抵消高昂的原材料和劳动力成本，并在消费电子产品需求减弱的情况下进行了裁员。

"In the short run, the company has been able to manage inflation through price. And if needed, we'll continue doing that," 3M Chief Financial Officer Monish Patolawala said on a call with analysts.

3M 首席财务官莫尼什·帕托拉瓦拉 (Monish Patolawala) 在与分析师的电话会议上表示：“从短期来看，该公司已经能够通过价格来管理通胀。如果需要，我们将继续这样做。”

More price hikes in the face of rising cost of living could prove challenging, as U.S. households are delaying big-ticket purchases and cutting back on discretionary spending amid an uncertain economic outlook.

面对生活成本上升，价格进一步上涨可能具有挑战性，因为在经济前景不确定的情况下，美国家庭正在推迟大宗采购并削减可自由支配支出。

The company's cost-cutting push helped it beat estimates but 3M is still faced with weak demand for consumer electronics, especially in China and Europe.

该公司的成本削减举措帮助其超出了预期，但 3M 仍面临消费电子产品需求疲软的问题，尤其是在中国和欧洲。

3M on Tuesday also flagged a soft back-to-school season and a continued impact from rising interest rates.

3M 周二还表示，返校季的疲软以及利率上升的持续影响。

The company took a pretax charge of $4.2 billion in the quarter to settle lawsuits by U.S. military veterans and service members who say they suffered hearing loss from using 3M's earplugs.

该公司在本季度收取了 42 亿美元的税前费用，以解决美国退伍军人和现役军人提起的诉讼，这些军人称自己因使用 3M 耳塞而遭受听力损失。

Analysts at J.P. Morgan and Barclays said litigation liabilities still remain the important driver of the company's shares.

摩根大通和巴克莱的分析师表示，诉讼负债仍然是该公司股价的重要推动力。

In June, 3M reached a $10.3 billion settlement with a host of U.S. public water systems to resolve water pollution claims tied to "forever chemicals", which are linked to cancer, hormonal dysfunction and environmental damage.

6 月，3M 与美国多家公共供水系统达成了 103 亿美元的和解协议，以解决与“永久化学品”相关的水污染索赔，这些化学品与癌症、荷尔蒙失调和环境破坏有关。

3M now expects full-year adjusted earnings per share to be in the range of $8.95 to $9.15 per share, versus prior forecast of $8.60 to $9.10.

3M 目前预计全年调整后每股收益将在 8.95 美元至 9.15 美元之间，而之前的预测为 8.60 美元至 9.10 美元。

The company's adjusted profit for the third quarter came in at $2.68 per share, above analysts' estimates of $2.34. Adjusted revenue of $8.02 billion also beat Street estimates of $7.98 billion.

该公司第三季度调整后利润为每股 2.68 美元，高于分析师预期的 2.34 美元。调整后收入为 80.2 亿美元，也超出了华尔街预期的 79.8 亿美元。

Reporting by Kannaki Deka in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel

item.title: 亚冠浦和浦项队不敌浦项队
item.description:
Urawa Red Diamonds slumped to a 2-0 loss to South Korea's Pohang Steelers at Saitama Stadium on Tuesday as the Asian Champions League title holders struggle in their quest for a place in the knockout rounds of this year's competition.

浦和红钻队周二在埼玉体育场以 2-0 输给韩国浦项制铁队，亚冠冠军联赛卫冕冠军浦和红钻队在今年比赛的淘汰赛中苦苦挣扎。

A goal in each half from Jeong Jae-hee and Goh Young-jun for Kim Gi-dong's visitors ensured Pohang stayed perfect in Group J with only the winners guaranteed to advance to the next round.

金基东队的郑在熙和高英俊在上下半场各进一球，确保浦项队在 J 组中保持完美，只有获胜者才能晋级下一轮。

Urawa remain on four points from their first three games and the Japanese side are now level with Wuhan Three Towns after the Chinese champions won 2-1 over a Hanoi FC side who finished their game with nine men.

浦和在前三场比赛中仍积 4 分，中国冠军球队以 2-1 战胜了 9 人的河内 FC 队，目前与武汉三镇队持平。

Joel Tagueu was sent off for the visitors following a dangerous head-high challenge in the fifth minute but it took Wei Shihao until the final minute of the half to give Wuhan the lead.

乔尔·塔古在第5分钟因一次危险的头顶冲撞被客队罚下，但韦世豪直到半场最后1分钟才帮助武汉取得领先。

Marcao added a crucial second goal in the 63rd minute and, while Pham Tuan Hai pulled one back for the visitors in the 87th minute, Dao Van Nam became the second Hanoi player to be sent off when he picked up his second booking in injury time.

Marcao在第63分钟打入关键的第二个进球，而Pham Tuan Hai在第87分钟为客队扳回一球，而Dao Van Nam在伤停补时阶段领到第二张黄牌，成为第二位被罚下场的河内球员。

Kawasaki Frontale maintained their perfect start to the competition with a 4-2 victory in Thailand over BG Pathum Thani to stay on top of Group I, three points ahead of former champions Ulsan Hyundai.

川崎前锋在泰国以4-2战胜巴吞他尼队，保持了比赛的完美开局，领先前冠军蔚山现代队3分，继续保持第一组的领先地位。

Daiya Tono gave the visitors the lead in the 14th minute only for Igor Sergeev to level the scores in first-half injury time with a fine header.

第 14 分钟，达亚·托诺 (Daiya Tono) 为客队取得领先，但伊戈尔·谢尔盖耶夫 (Igor Sergeev) 在上半场伤停补时阶段凭借一记漂亮的头球扳平比分。

A handling error from home goalkeeper Chatchai Budprom gifted Kento Tachibanada Kawasaki's second goal seven minutes after the restart while goals from Marcinho and Takuma Ominami meant Victor Cardoso's penalty was only a consolation.

比赛重新开始七分钟后，主队门将查猜·布德普罗姆的处理失误为川崎贤人攻入了第二个进球，而马尔西尼奥和大南琢磨的进球意味着维克托·卡多佐的点球只是一个安慰。

Hosts Ulsan had three goals in the opening 18 minutes to thank for their 3-1 win over Malaysia's Johor Darul Ta'zim, which was picked up despite Kim Tae-hwan's sending off nine minutes before halftime.

东道主蔚山队在开场 18 分钟内打入三球，最终以 3-1 击败马来西亚选手柔佛达鲁尔·塔齐姆，尽管金泰焕在半场结束前 9 分钟被罚下场，但球队仍取得了进球。

Jung Seung-hyun volleyed in Darijan Bojanic's corner at the far post after five minutes to give Ulsan the perfect start and Gustav Ludwigson doubled the advantage seven minutes later with a cool finish when one-on-one with goalkeeper Syihan Hazmi.

五分钟后，郑承贤在远门柱处接达里扬·博亚尼奇的角球抽射，为蔚山队带来了完美的开局，七分钟后古斯塔夫·路德维格森在与门将西汉·哈兹米一对一时以冷静的射门将优势扩大一倍。

The Swede added the third in the 18th minute with a fine solo effort that saw him jink beyond Matt Davies and score in the bottom corner.

瑞典人在第 18 分钟凭借出色的个人射门打入第三球，他超越马特·戴维斯并在底角得分。

Ulsan were comfortable until Kim was sent off for a second bookable offence following a rash challenge on La'Vere Corbin-Ong in the 36th minute but, while Bergson's strike reduced the deficit in the 53rd minute, Ulsan held on.

蔚山队一直表现得很舒服，直到金在第36分钟对拉维尔·科尔宾-翁的鲁莽挑战后因第二次黄牌警告而被罚下场，但当伯格森在第53分钟的进球缩小了比分差距时，蔚山队坚持了下来。

The winners of the 10 groups across Asia will progress to the last 16, where they will be joined by the three runners-up with the best records from their respective halves of the continent.

亚洲 10 个小组的获胜者将晋级 16 强，他们将与各自亚洲地区战绩最好的三名亚军一起晋级。

Reporting by Michael Church, Editing by Clare Fallon

item.title: 通用汽车撤回 2023 年指引，UAW 罢工 SUV 工厂
item.description:
General Motors (GM.N) on Tuesday withdrew its 2023 profit outlook just ahead of a new United Auto Workers walkout at one of its most profitable factories.

通用汽车(GM.N)周二在其最赚钱的工厂之一美国汽车工人联合会举行新一轮罢工之前撤回了 2023 年利润预期。

With the UAW clash throttling revenue and profits, Chief Executive Mary Barra told investors the automaker will slow its electric vehicle strategy to put profits ahead of sales targets.

由于汽车工人联合会的冲突限制了收入和利润，首席执行官玛丽·博拉 (Mary Barra) 告诉投资者，该汽车制造商将放慢其电动汽车战略，以将利润置于销售目标之前。

United Auto Workers President Shawn Fain ordered a walkout at the automaker's Arlington, Texas, factory, which builds highly profitable Cadillac Escalade, Chevrolet Suburban and other large SUVs. The move came less than four hours after GM posted better-than-expected third quarter results.

美国汽车工人联合会主席肖恩·费恩 (Shawn Fain) 下令该汽车制造商位于德克萨斯州阿灵顿的工厂举行罢工，该工厂生产利润丰厚的凯迪拉克凯雷德、雪佛兰 Suburban 和其他大型 SUV。此举是在通用汽车公布好于预期的第三季度业绩后不到四个小时做出的。

The UAW's move to shut down one of GM's most profitable plants will push the weekly cost of the union's strikes well above the $200 million-a-week rate GM executives outlined for investors earlier Tuesday.

UAW 关闭通用汽车最赚钱的工厂之一的举措将使工会每周的罢工成本远高于通用汽车高管周二早些时候向投资者概述的每周 2 亿美元的成本。

GM's third quarter results beat expectations. Fain pointed to that as a cause for the UAW to increase pressure on the company to improve its contract offer, which currently includes a 23% wage increase over 4-1/2 years.

通用汽车第三季度业绩超出预期。 Fain 指出，这是 UAW 向该公司增加压力以改善其合同报价的一个原因，目前合同报价包括在 4-1/2 年内加薪 23%。

"It’s time GM workers, and the whole working class, get their fair share," Fain said in a statement Tuesday.

费恩在周二的一份声明中表示：“现在是通用汽车工人和整个工人阶级获得公平份额的时候了。”

During a call with analysts, Barra called GM's offer a record contract that would allow GM's U.S. factory workers to earn up to $84,000 a year, and also compel the company to look for further cost savings.

在与分析师的电话会议中，博拉称通用汽车的报价是创纪录的合同，该合同将使通用汽车美国工厂的工人年薪高达 84,000 美元，并迫使该公司寻求进一步节省成本的方法。

"We will not agree to a contract that isn’t responsible to our employees and our shareholders," she said.

“我们不会同意一份对我们的员工和股东不负责的合同，”她说。

GM's third-quarter net income fell 7.3% to $3.06 billion, while revenue rose 5.4% to $44.1 billion. The adjusted earnings per share tracked by analysts were $2.28, ahead of Wall Street expectations and up from $2.25 a year ago because of the effect of share buybacks.

通用汽车第三季度净利润下降7.3%至30.6亿美元，而营收增长5.4%至441亿美元。由于股票回购的影响，分析师追踪的调整后每股收益为 2.28 美元，高于华尔街预期，并且高于一年前的 2.25 美元。

GM shares were volatile in early trading, hitting their lowest levels in three years before moving up about 1.5%.

通用汽车股价早盘波动较大，触及三年来最低水平，随后上涨约 1.5%。

The rising toll of the UAW strikes, the outlook for higher labor costs once a new contract is reached, rising warranty expenses and an uncertain macroeconomic outlook have forced GM to abandon previous targets for full-year financial performance that it had lifted in July.

UAW罢工人数不断增加、新合同签订后劳动力成本上涨的前景、保修费用上升以及宏观经济前景的不确定性，迫使通用汽车放弃了7月份提高的全年财务业绩目标。

As the pace of EV sales growth has slowed in North America and even industry leader Tesla (TSLA.O) is expressing caution over the pace of its expansion, GM is reworking its EV strategy in the region, pulling back from efforts to challenge Tesla's lead in the U.S. EV segment.

由于北美电动汽车销量增长步伐放缓，甚至行业领导者特斯拉（TSLA.O）也对其扩张步伐表示谨慎，通用汽车正在重新制定其在该地区的电动汽车战略，放弃挑战特斯拉领先地位的努力在美国电动汽车领域。

CUTTING COSTS

Barra said the automaker is also slowing the launch of several EV models to cut their costs, and pulling back on EV product spending.

博拉表示，该汽车制造商还放慢了几款电动汽车车型的推出，以降低成本，并削减电动汽车产品支出。

GM will save billions thanks to a decision to redesign and relaunch the Chevrolet Bolt EV, using lower-cost lithium-iron batteries, and jettisoning an earlier plan to spend $5 billion for several new entry-level EVs, Barra said.

博拉表示，通用汽车决定重新设计和重新推出雪佛兰 Bolt 电动汽车，使用成本更低的锂铁电池，并放弃先前斥资 50 亿美元购买几款新入门级电动汽车的计划，因此将节省数十亿美元。

The next-generation Bolt also will use lower-cost lithium-iron batteries purchased from China, GM said.

通用汽车表示，下一代Bolt还将使用从中国购买的成本较低的锂铁电池。

GM is abandoning a goal of building 400,000 EVs from 2022 through mid-2024, Chief Financial Officer Paul Jacobson said.

首席财务官保罗·雅各布森 (Paul Jacobson) 表示，通用汽车放弃了从 2022 年到 2024 年中期生产40 万辆电动汽车的目标。

"We're just not going to be talking about the interim production goals," Jacobson said.

“我们只是不会谈论中期生产目标，”雅各布森说。

Barra said GM has "work to do" to hit its low- to mid-single-digit earnings before interest and taxes (EBIT) margin target by 2025.

博拉表示，通用汽车“还有很多工作要做”，要到 2025 年实现息税前利润 (EBIT) 低至中个位数的目标。

GM's decision to delay retooling of a large factory in Orion Township, Michigan, to build electric pickup trucks will save $1.5 billion in capital investments in 2024, Jacobson said.

雅各布森表示，通用汽车决定推迟对密歇根州猎户座镇一家大型工厂进行设备重组以生产电动皮卡，这将在 2024 年节省 15 亿美元的资本投资。

The delay in electric truck expansion "will actually allow us to incorporate some of the changes and improvements that we've seen in early-stage production" and improve profit margins when the electric Silverados and GMC Sierras start production, he said.

他表示，电动卡车扩张的推迟“实际上将使我们能够纳入我们在早期生产中看到的一些变化和改进”，并在电动 Silverados 和 GMC Sierras 开始生产时提高利润率。

The company has joined other automakers in urging the Biden administration to back away from ambitious emissions and fuel economy rules aimed at pushing EVs to two-thirds of the U.S. vehicle market by 2032.

该公司与其他汽车制造商一起敦促拜登政府放弃雄心勃勃的排放和燃油经济性规则，旨在到 2032 年将电动汽车推向美国汽车市场的三分之二。

So far, GM's sales and pricing in North America have remained stable. Average selling prices for GM vehicles were $50,750 in the latest quarter, slightly down from the previous quarter.

到目前为止，通用汽车在北美的销量和定价保持稳定。最新季度通用汽车汽车的平均售价为 50,750 美元，较上一季度略有下降。

However, the automaker said its cost-cutting efforts only "partially offset" higher costs for EV launches, increased warranty expenses and lower pension income in the quarter.

然而，该汽车制造商表示，其成本削减措施仅“部分抵消”了本季度电动汽车推出成本的上升、保修费用的增加以及养老金收入的下降。

Overall, GM said profits for the quarter were pulled down by $1.5 billion because of higher costs and the impact of selling more EVs. Unlike rival Ford (F.N), GM does not break out losses from its EV operations.

通用汽车表示，总体而言，由于成本上升以及电动汽车销量增加的影响，本季度利润减少了 15 亿美元。与竞争对手福特（FN）不同，通用汽车并未公布其电动汽车业务的亏损。

Jacobson said GM executives are concerned about rising interest rates as well as the conflict in the Middle East and whether that could affect consumer behavior. But he did not echo Tesla CEO Elon Musk's pessimism about the impact of rising interest rates on consumer demand.

雅各布森表示，通用汽车高管担心利率上升以及中东冲突以及这是否会影响消费者行为。但他并没有赞同特斯拉首席执行官埃隆·马斯克对利率上升对消费者需求影响的悲观态度。

"What I would tell you is that so far the consumer has held up remarkably well for us as evidenced by the average transaction prices," Jacobson said.

雅各布森说：“我要告诉你的是，到目前为止，消费者对我们的支持非常好，平均交易价格就证明了这一点。”

GM also said losses at its Cruise robotaxi unit widened to $732 million in the quarter. GM said the losses were "in line with expectations" as operations expanded to 15 cities.

通用汽车还表示，其 Cruise 自动驾驶出租车部门本季度亏损扩大至 7.32 亿美元。通用汽车表示，随着业务扩展到 15 个城市，亏损“符合预期”。

Reporting by Joe White and Nathan Gomes; Additional reporting by Ben Klayman; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama, Mark Porter, Nick Zieminski and Jonathan Oatis

item.title: 中国罢免国防部长，这是三个月内第二位下台的高级领导人
item.description:
China removed its defence minister on Tuesday, the second ousting of a senior leader in three months, raising questions about the stability of the leadership team around Chinese President Xi Jinping.

中国周二罢免了国防部长，这是三个月内第二次罢免高级领导人，引发了人们对中国国家主席习近平领导团队稳定性的质疑。

General Li Shangfu, who has been absent from public view for two months, was dismissed as defence minister and state councillor, according to state media.

据官方媒体报道，已经消失两个月的李尚福将军被免去国防部长和国务委员职务。

China also announced that Qin Gang, who was removed as foreign minister in July, was stripped of his state councillor position.

中国还宣布， 取消7月免去外交部长职务的秦刚国务委员职务。

China's top legislators, the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, approved the removal of both men, state broadcaster CCTV reported, without giving any explanation.

据官方电视台中央电视台报道，中国最高立法机关全国人民代表大会常务委员会批准解除两人的职务，但没有给出任何解释。

No replacement for Li was named, leaving the country without a defence minister as it prepares to host foreign defence officials at the Beijing Xiangshan Forum on Oct. 29-31.

由于中国准备在10月29日至31日的北京香山论坛上接待外国国防部长，但没有任命李克强的继任者，导致中国没有国防部长。

Li, 65, was last seen in public on Aug. 29. Reuters reported last month that he was under investigation for suspected corruption related to equipment procurement and development.

65 岁的李最后一次公开露面是在 8 月 29 日。路透社上个月报道称，他因涉嫌与设备采购和开发相关的腐败而接受调查。

He had only been in the job since March, when Xi started his precedent-breaking third term as head of state. Li, who is under U.S. sanctions over Beijing's purchase of combat aircraft and equipment from Russia, is China's shortest-serving defence minister.

他是从三月份习近平开始破例地担任国家元首的第三个任期后才开始担任这一职务的。李克强是中国任期最短的国防部长，因北京从俄罗斯购买战斗机和装备而受到美国制裁。

Qin had also served less than a year before he disappeared from public view and was replaced by his predecessor, Wang Yi. No formal explanation has been given but the Wall Street Journal cited sources saying Qin had an extramarital affair while he was ambassador to the United States.

秦也任职不到一年就从公众视野中消失，并由他的前任王毅接任。目前尚未给出正式解释，但《华尔街日报》援引消息人士的话称，秦在担任驻美国大使期间曾有过婚外情。

The disappearances of Li and Qin have raised questions from diplomats about the abrupt changes in China's leadership at a time when the country's economic growth is sluggish and its relations with the United States have soured over a range of issues.

李和秦的失踪引发了外交官对中国领导层突然更迭的质疑，因为中国经济增长乏力，中美关系因一系列问题而恶化。

Both Li and Qin were seen by observers of Chinese politics as handpicked by Xi, making their absence after less than a year on the job particularly notable. The two men had prominent public-facing roles and also served among China's five state councillors, a post outranking a regular minister.

中国政治观察人士认为，李和秦都是习近平亲自挑选的，这使得他们上任不到一年后的缺席尤其引人注目。这两个人都担任过重要的面向公众的角色，并且还曾在中国五位国务委员中担任过职务，其职位级别高于普通部长。

item.title: 中国任命兰福安为新任财政部长以推动经济刺激
item.description:
China has appointed Lan Foan, a technocrat with little central government experience, as the new finance minister, state media said on Tuesday, as the government ramps up fiscal stimulus in a bid to revive the economy.

官方媒体周二称，中国已任命缺乏中央政府经验的技术官僚兰福安为新财政部长，政府加大财政刺激力度以重振经济。

Lan, 61, who was named the Communist Party chief at the finance ministry last month, has succeeded Liu Kun who had been finance minister since 2018.

61岁的兰上个月被任命为财政部党组书记，接替自2018年以来一直担任财政部长的刘昆。

Previously, Lan was the party chief of the northern Chinese Shanxi province.

此前，兰曾任中国北方山西省省委书记。

Lan's appointment, which is widely expected, comes as China ramps up fiscal stimulus to shore up its economic recovery, drawing on a well-used playbook that relies heavily on debt and state spending but falls short on the deeper reforms.

人们普遍预期兰的任命正值中国加大财政刺激力度以支撑经济复苏之际，中国借鉴了严重依赖债务和国家支出但缺乏更深层次改革的惯用策略。

China's top parliament body on Tuesday approved the issuance of 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) in sovereign bonds in the fourth quarter to fund rebuilding of areas hit by this year's floods, state media said, confirming an earlier Reuters report.

官方媒体称，中国最高人大机构周二批准在第四季度发行1万亿元人民币（1,370亿美元）的主权债券，为今年遭受洪水袭击的地区的重建提供资金，这证实了路透社早些时候的报道。

The parliament also passed a bill that will allow local governments to front load part of their 2024 bond quotas.

议会还通过了一项法案，允许地方政府提前加载部分2024年债券配额。

The world's second-largest economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter, improving the chances Beijing can meet its growth target of around 5% for 2023.

全球第二大经济体第三季度增长快于预期，提高了北京实现2023年5%左右增长目标的机会。

But headwinds persist a the property crisis deepens and private firms reluctant to spending amid weak confidence.

但随着房地产危机加深，私营企业在信心疲弱的情况下不愿支出，不利因素依然存在。

Lan began his career at the finance department of the southern Guangdong province in 1985, after graduating from the Hubei University of Finance and Economics, and became a vice provincial chief in 2016, according to his profile.

据他的个人资料显示，兰从湖北财经学院毕业后，于1985年在广东省财政厅开始了自己的职业生涯，并于2016年成为省副厅长。

He transferred to Shanxi in 2021, as the province's vice party chief, before becoming the party chief in December 2022.

他于2021年调任山西省委副书记，并于2022年12月担任山西省委书记。

Liu, China's finance minister since 2018, has surpassed the official retirement age of 65 for minister-level officials.

刘鹤自2018年起担任中国财政部长，已超过部长级官员65岁的官方退休年龄。

($1 = 7.3090 Chinese yuan renminbi)

item.title: 中国习近平首次访问央行——消息人士
item.description:
Chinese President Xi Jinping made his first known visit to the nation's central bank since he became president a decade ago, two sources with knowledge of the matter said, as China's economy and financial markets grapple with headwinds.

两位知情人士称，中国国家主席习近平自十年前就任国家主席以来首次访问中国央行，之际中国经济和金融市场正面临逆风。

Xi, along with Vice Premier He Lifeng and other government officials, visited the People's Bank of China (PBOC) and the State Administration of Foreign Exchange (SAFE) in Beijing on Tuesday, the sources told Reuters.

消息人士告诉路透社，习近平与副总理何立峰和其他政府官员周二访问了位于北京的中国人民银行（PBOC）和国家外汇管理局（SAFE）。

The purpose of the visit was not immediately known. The PBOC and SAFE could not be immediately reached for comment outside of business hours.

此次访问的目的尚不清楚。在工作时间之外，未能立即联系到中国人民银行和国家外汇管理局置评。

The world's second-largest economy grew faster than expected in the third quarter. But there are deeper concerns about continued weakness in private sector activity and a lack of longer-term reforms needed to shift the economy to consumer-led growth.

全球第二大经济体第三季度增长快于预期。但人们更担心私营部门活动持续疲软，以及缺乏将经济转向消费者主导型增长所需的长期改革。

The PBOC, which delivered modest interest rate cuts and has pumped more cash into the economy in recent weeks, is constrained in how much it can ease monetary policy for fear of stoking capital flight and hurting the yuan, analysts said.

分析师表示，近几周来，中国央行小幅降息并向经济注入了更多现金，但由于担心引发资本外逃并损害人民币汇率，其放松货币政策的力度受到限制。

Capital outflows from China rose sharply to $75 billion in September, the biggest monthly figure since 2016, Goldman Sachs' preferred gauge of foreign exchange flows showed, underscoring intensifying depreciation pressure on the yuan.

高盛首选的外汇流动指标显示，9月份中国资本外流大幅增至750亿美元，为2016年以来最大月度数字，突显人民币贬值压力加剧。

item.title: 三菱汽车将终止在中国的生产，投资雷诺电动汽车部门
item.description:
Japan's Mitsubishi Motors (7211.T) said it will end production of its cars at its joint venture in China and transfer its stake in the unit to its Chinese partner, becoming the latest foreign automaker to cut back its operations in the world's top auto market.

日本三菱汽车（7211.T）表示，将停止在中国合资企业的汽车生产，并将其所持股份转让给中国合作伙伴，成为最新一家削减在全球顶级汽车市场业务的外国汽车制造商。

The decision by the Japanese car maker comes amid fierce price competition in China which has led global automakers such as Hyundai Motor (005380.KS) and Stellantis (STLAM.MI) to take steps to bring down costs by restructuring their businesses.

这家日本汽车制造商的这一决定是在中国激烈的价格竞争之际做出的，这导致现代汽车(005380.KS)和Stellantis (STLAM.MI)等全球汽车制造商采取措施通过重组业务来降低成本。

Mitsubishi Motors separately said on Tuesday it will invest up to 200 million euros ($214 million) in the new electric vehicle unit of French counterpart Renault (RENA.PA), as it seeks to strengthen its foothold in Europe and other markets.

三菱汽车周二另外表示，将向法国雷诺汽车(RENA.PA)的新电动汽车部门投资至多 2 亿欧元（2.14 亿美元），以加强其在欧洲和其他市场的立足点。

The Japanese automaker established its JV in China with Guangzhou Automobile Group (GAC) (601238.SS) and trading house Mitsubishi Corp (8058.T) in 2012.

这家日本汽车制造商于 2012 年与广汽集团 (GAC) (601238.SS)和贸易公司三菱商事(8058.T)在中国成立了合资企业。

Following a transfer of Mitsubishi Motors' and Mitsubishi's stake in the JV to their Chinese partner, it will become a wholly-owned subsidiary of GAC, the Japanese automaker said.

这家日本汽车制造商表示，在将三菱汽车和三菱汽车在合资公司中的股权转让给中国合作伙伴后，该合资公司将成为广汽集团的全资子公司。

The JV plant will start producing GAC's Aion cars from June 2024, which would help the EV brand to achieve a total annual capacity of 600,000 units by then, GAC said in a separate statement on the social media WeChat platform.

广汽集团在社交媒体微信平台上发布的另一份声明称，合资工厂将于2024年6月开始生产广汽Aion汽车，届时该电动汽车品牌将实现年总产能60万辆。

Mitsubishi Motors would book a special loss of 24.3 billion yen ($162.40 million) in the current financial year for restructuring in China. It did not make any change to its full-year earnings forecast.

三菱汽车将在本财年因在中国的重组而计入 243 亿日元（1.624 亿美元）的特别亏损。它没有对全年盈利预测做出任何改变。

AMPERE INVESTMENT

Mitsubishi Motors said it is seeking to improve its EV development technology with its investment in Renault's Ampere EV business, which the French automaker is looking to list on the stock market next year.

三菱汽车表示，正在寻求通过投资雷诺的 Ampere 电动汽车业务来改进其电动汽车开发技术，该法国汽车制造商计划明年在股市上市。

Renault Chairman Jean-Dominique Senard, speaking on the sidelines of an event in Paris, said he welcomed Mitsubishi's investment and had always been confident the company would take part in Ampere.

雷诺董事长让-多米尼克·塞纳德 (Jean-Dominique Senard) 在巴黎举行的一次活动间隙发表讲话时表示，他欢迎三菱的投资，并且一直对三菱参与 Ampere 充满信心。

"As a first step of this collaboration, Ampere will supply an EV on an OEM (original equipment manufacturer) basis in the European market," Mitsubishi said in a statement.

三菱在一份声明中表示：“作为此次合作的第一步，Ampere 将在欧洲市场以 OEM（原始设备制造商）的方式供应电动汽车。”

Senard said he intends to talk in more detail with Mitsubishi during an upcoming trip to Japan.

塞纳德表示，他打算在即将到来的日本之行期间与三菱进行更详细的交谈。

The decision to invest in Ampere comes after Mitsubishi's partners, Renault and Nissan Motor (7201.T), finalised a restructured alliance in July.

三菱的合作伙伴雷诺和日产汽车(7201.T)在 7 月份敲定了重组联盟后，做出了投资 Ampere 的决定。

Nissan has already committed to invest up to 600 million euros in the unit, consistent with it being a strategic investor and securing a board seat on the new company.

日产汽车已承诺向该部门投资高达 6 亿欧元，以符合其作为战略投资者并获得新公司董事会席位的要求。

item.title: 早盘竞价：大型科技公司报告债券收益率回落
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Big Tech heavyweights Microsoft (MSFT.O) and Alphabet (GOOGL.O) are set to switch global investors' focus from Monday's bond market bounce, although the latter has improved the market mood considerably ahead of the week's big earnings reports.

大型科技巨头微软（MSFT.O）和Alphabet （GOOGL.O）将把全球投资者的注意力从周一债券市场的反弹上转移开，尽管后者在本周的大型财报发布之前已经大大改善了市场情绪。

The two tech giants report after the bell on Tuesday, with Meta (META.O) following on Wednesday and Amazon (AMZN.O) on Thursday. These four stocks combined account for a whopping 23.4% weighting in the S&P500 (.SPX) - just shy of their 24% pandemic peak and twice the share they held just six years ago.

这两家科技巨头将于周二收盘后公布财报，Meta (META.O)将于周三公布，亚马逊(AMZN.O)将于周四公布。这四只股票在标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)中的权重合计高达 23.4%，仅略低于疫情期间 24% 的峰值，是六年前所持份额的两倍。

Partly lifted by the year's artificial intelligence craze, the tech behemoths have clearly flattered year-to-date gains of 10% in the overall S&P500. And on an equal-weighted basis, the index is actually down 3.6% for 2023 so far.

在今年人工智能热潮的推动下，这些科技巨头显然对标普 500 指数今年迄今 10% 的整体涨幅感到满意。在等权重基础上，该指数 2023 年迄今实际上已下跌 3.6%。

And yet the seemingly endless squeeze in bond markets since midyear has seen megacap indexes (.NYFANG) retreat some 12% from their highs for the year.

然而，自年中以来债券市场似乎无休无止的紧缩已经导致大型股指数(.NYFANG)从今年高点回落约 12%。

The sight of 10-year Treasury yields topping 5% for the first time in 16 years early on Monday underscored that angst - but the pressure eased significantly during the session as some bond buyers emerged above to lock in yields above that threshold.

周一早些时候，10 年期国债收益率 16 年来首次突破 5%，凸显了这种担忧，但随着一些债券买家出现将收益率锁定在该阈值以上，压力在盘中大幅缓解。

The reason for the rather sudden 10-year recoil on Monday were sketchy beyond the breach of the milestone, though it coincided with some major investors claiming it was time to close short positions on Treasuries.

周一突然出现的 10 年期反弹的原因除了突破这一里程碑之外还很粗略，尽管恰逢一些主要投资者声称是时候平仓美国国债空头头寸了。

Billionaire investor Bill Ackman said the covered his previous bets against Treasuries on an expectation U.S. economic numbers would deteriorate from here and the Gaza war would push more investor dollars towards U.S. government bonds.

亿万富翁投资者比尔·阿克曼(Bill Ackman)表示，他回补了之前做空美国国债的押注，因为他预计美国经济数据将从此恶化，而加沙战争将推动更多投资者的资金转向美国政府债券。

Perhaps ironically, it was also an ebbing oil price after the weekend - amid hostage releases and aid convoys that stirred some hope for a temporary ceasefire in Israel's military retaliation in Gaza - that helped bonds bounce on the day.

也许具有讽刺意味的是，周末后油价的下跌——人质获释和援助车队激起了人们对以色列对加沙的军事报复暂时停火的一些希望——也帮助债券当天反弹。

More broadly, sovereign debt prices were also helped on Tuesday by signs of mounting pressure on business activity around the world from spiralling borrowing costs, anxious geopolitics and China's economic problems.

更广泛地说，周二的主权债务价格也因不断上升的借贷成本、焦虑的地缘政治和中国的经济问题给全球商业活动带来越来越大的压力而得到提振。

Euro zone business activity took a surprise turn for the worse this month as demand fell in a broad-based downturn across the region, early "flash" surveys for October showed. The euro fell back sharply from one-month highs.

10月份早期的“快速”调查显示，本月欧元区商业活动意外恶化，原因是该地区普遍低迷，需求下降。欧元从一个月高点大幅回落。

Sister surveys for the United States are due out later by contrast.

相比之下，美国的姊妹调查将于晚些时候公布。

Britain's labour market also lost more of its inflationary heat in the three months to August, according to new data, potentially helping the Bank of England to keep interest rates on hold next week and dragging down gilt yields.

新数据显示，截至8月的三个月里，英国劳动力市场的通胀热度也有所减弱，这可能有助于英国央行下周维持利率不变，并拖累英国国债收益率。

The upshot of the whole picture is to give U.S. stock futures a lift ahead of the open on Tuesday - with Asia and European bourses in positive territory too as bond markets stabilised. The Vix (.VIX) volatility gauge fell back below 20 from seven-month highs of 23 hit in the previous session.

整体情况的结果是美国股指期货在周二开盘前上涨，随着债券市场企稳，亚洲和欧洲股市也出现上涨。 Vix (.VIX)波动率指标从前一交易日触及的七个月高点 23 回落至 20 以下。

Ten-year U.S. Treasury yields held about 4.83% - some 19 basis points below Monday's peak at 5.02%. The dollar (.DXY) bounced from one-month lows to trade higher on the day.

十年期美国国债收益率维持在 4.83% 左右，较周一峰值 5.02% 低约 19 个基点。美元（.DXY）当天从一个月低点反弹，走高。

Treasury auctions this week will again test demand for U.S. government paper, with $51 billion of 2-year notes up for sale on Tuesday, $52 billion in 5-year notes due on Wednesday and $38 billion in 7-year notes on Thursday.

本周的国债拍卖将再次考验对美国政府票据的需求，周二将出售 510 亿美元的 2 年期国债，周三将出售 520 亿美元的 5 年期国债，周四将出售 380 亿美元的 7 年期国债。

Elsewhere, Britain's FTSE 100 (.FTSE) underperformed due to a near 7% drop in shares of Barclays (BARC.L) after the UK lender cut its full-year guidance on net interest margins despite beating quarterly profit forecast.

其他方面，英国富时 100 指数(.FTSE)表现不佳，原因是巴克莱银行(BARC.L)的股价下跌近 7%，此前英国银行尽管超出季度利润预期，但仍下调了全年净息差指引。

In euro zone banking, UniCredit (CRDI.MI) climbed 1.8% as the Italian bank posted a bigger-than-expected annual rise of 36% in its third-quarter profit.

欧元区银行业方面，意大利裕信银行 (UniCredit ) (CRDI.MI)上涨 1.8%，这家意大利银行公布第三季度利润同比增长 36%，超出预期。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:

周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* Flash October business surveys from United States and around the world via S&P Global; Richmond Fed Oct manufacturing survey, Philadelphia Fed Oct service sector survey

* 通过 S&P Global 提供的美国和世界各地的 Flash 10 月商业调查；里士满联储10月制造业调查、费城联储10月服务业调查

* U.S. corporate earnings: Microsoft, Alphabet, Visa, Coca-Cola, Danaher, Texas Instruments, Verizon, General Electric, NextEra Energy, Invesco, Fiserv, HCA Healthcare, General Motors, Halliburton, Dow, Kimberly-Clark, Spotify, Dover, Nucor, Waste Management, CoStar, 3M, F5, Chubb, Paccar, Centene, Sherwin-Williams, Archer-Daniels-Midland, RTX, Quest, Pentair, Synchrony

* 美国企业盈利：微软、Alphabet、Visa、可口可乐、丹纳赫、德州仪器、Verizon、通用电气、NextEra Energy、Invesco、Fiserv、HCA Healthcare、通用汽车、哈里伯顿、陶氏化学、金佰利、Spotify、多佛、纽柯、废物管理、CoStar、3M、F5、丘博、帕卡、Centene、宣伟、阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰、RTX、Quest、Pentair、Synchrony

* U.S. Treasury auctions 2-year notes

item.title: 韩国扣押载有疑似脱北者的船只
item.description:
South Korean authorities on Tuesday detained a North Korean boat carrying people believed to be seeking to defect from the isolated country, the military said.

韩国军方表示，韩国当局周二扣留了一艘朝鲜船只，船上载有据信试图逃离这个孤立国家的人。

The small, wooden vessel was stopped off South Korea's eastern city of Sokcho after being spotted near the Northern Limit Line, the de facto sea boundary between the two Koreas, early on Tuesday, the Joint Chiefs of Staff said.

参谋长联席会议表示，周二早些时候，这艘小型木船在韩国东部城市束草附近被发现位于朝鲜两国事实上的海上边界北部界限附近，随后被拦截。

The military did not disclose how many people were aboard, but Yonhap news agency said four North Koreans were on the vessel and had expressed their intent to defect.

军方没有透露船上有多少人，但韩联社称，船上有四名朝鲜人，并已表达了叛逃的意图。

It is the second known case of North Koreans crossing the sea border to seek defection in recent months, after nine people crossed the western sea boundary on a fishing boat in May.

这是近几个月来第二起已知的朝鲜人越过海上边界寻求叛逃的案件，此前有九人于五月乘坐一艘渔船越过西部海上边界。

Most North Korean escapees make their way through China and Southeast Asia, rather than attempting to cross the heavily guarded border between North and South Korea.

大多数朝鲜逃亡者都是通过中国和东南亚，而不是试图穿越朝鲜和韩国之间戒备森严的边境。

In 2019, South Korea deported two North Korean fishermen suspected of murdering 16 shipmates aboard their vessel while crossing the sea border. This month, South Korea said it had protested to China over the suspected forced repatriation of a large number of North Koreans, who rights groups say face imprisonment and abuse at the hands of North Korean authorities.

2019年，韩国驱逐了两名涉嫌在穿越海上边界时杀害船上16名船员的朝鲜渔民。本月，韩国表示已就涉嫌强迫遣返大量朝鲜人向中国提出抗议，人权组织称这些人面临朝鲜当局的监禁和虐待。

A Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson said at the time there were no "so-called defectors" in China, when asked about a report Beijing had deported about 600 North Korean defectors.

当被问及北京驱逐约600名脱北者的报道时，中国外交部发言人当时表示，中国不存在“所谓的脱北者”。

item.title: 中国1-9月财政收入增速放缓，复苏乏力
item.description:
China's fiscal revenue grew 8.9% in the first nine months, decelerating from a 10% gain in January-August, official data showed, as its economic recovery remained on shaky ground.

官方数据显示，中国前九个月财政收入增长8.9%，较1月至8月10%的增幅有所放缓，原因是经济复苏仍不稳定。

Fiscal revenue hit 16.67 trillion yuan ($2.28 trillion)during January-September, while fiscal expenditure rose 3.9% to 19.79 trillion yuan, data from the finance ministry showed on Tuesday.

财政部周二公布的数据显示，1-9月财政收入达到16.67万亿元人民币（合2.28万亿美元），财政支出增长3.9%至19.79万亿元人民币。

In September alone, fiscal revenue fell 1.3% year-on-year, compared with a 4.6% fall in August, according to Reuters calculations based on the ministry's data.

路透社根据财政部数据计算，仅9月份财政收入就同比下降1.3%，而8月份则下降4.6%。

Fiscal spending was up 5.2%, cooling from a 7.2% rise in August.

财政支出增长 5.2%，低于 8 月份 7.2% 的增幅。

Thanks to recent policy support, China's economy grew at a faster-than-expected pace in the third quarter while September activity indicators largely surprised on the upside, though economists say there are still some significant weak spots, particularly in the property market, which remains in a deep contraction.

得益于近期的政策支持，中国经济第三季度增长速度快于预期，而 9 月份的经济活动指标大幅上行，但经济学家表示，仍然存在一些重大弱点，尤其是房地产市场。在深度收缩中。

According to the National Bureau of Statistics, China could achieve its full-year growth target of around 5% if fourth quarter gross domestic product (GDP) growth is above 4.4%.

国家统计局预计，如果四季度国内生产总值(GDP)增长在4.4%以上，中国就可以实现全年5%左右的增长目标。

Various brokerages including JP Morgan and Nomura have lifted their forecast for China's 2023 economic growth.

摩根大通、野村证券等多家券商均上调了对中国2023年经济增长的预测。

Some government advisers are recommending China lift its 2024 budget deficit target beyond the 3% of GDP set for this year, which would allow Beijing to issue more bonds to revive the economy, policy insiders and economists have told Reuters. read more

政策内部人士和经济学家告诉路透社，一些政府顾问建议中国将 2024 年预算赤字目标提高到今年设定的 GDP 的 3% 以上，这将使北京能够发行更多债券来重振经济。 阅读更多

item.title: 斯里兰卡批准向七个国家提供免费旅游签证以促进旅游业
item.description:
Sri Lanka's cabinet approved issuing free tourist visas to visitors from seven countries including China, India and Russia, a statement issued by the media ministry said on Tuesday, to boost tourism and help revive its crisis-hit economy.

斯里兰卡媒体部周二发表声明称，斯里兰卡内阁批准向来自中国、印度和俄罗斯等七个国家的游客发放免费旅游签证，以促进旅游业并帮助重振遭受危机打击的经济。

Tourists from China, India, Russia, Japan, Thailand, Indonesia, and Malaysia will be issued free visas till March 31, 2024 under a pilot programme, the statement detailing cabinet decisions said.

详细介绍内阁决定的声明称，根据试点计划，将在 2024 年 3 月 31 日之前向来自中国、印度、俄罗斯、日本、泰国、印度尼西亚和马来西亚的游客发放免费签证。

The scheme is part of attempts by Sri Lanka to boost tourism recovery and hit a target of five million arrivals by 2026, the statement added.

声明补充说，该计划是斯里兰卡促进旅游业复苏、实现到 2026 年游客人数达到 500 万人次的目标的一部分。

The country of 22 million people, famed for its beaches, ancient temples and aromatic tea, saw its tourism industry pummelled first by the COVID-19 pandemic and then by a severe financial crisis last year that saw mass scale protests and shortages of essentials such as fuel.

这个拥有 2200 万人口的国家以海滩、古老寺庙和芳香茶而闻名，其旅游业首先受到了新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行的打击，然后又受到了去年严重的金融危机的打击，导致大规模抗议和必需品短缺，例如燃料。

But the tourism industry is seeing a turnaround in 2023 with Sri Lanka clocking a million arrivals by September, for the first time since 2019. The island is expecting to close the year at 1.5 million arrivals.

但旅游业将在 2023 年出现好转，到 9 月，斯里兰卡游客数量将首次突破 100 万人次，这是自 2019 年以来首次。该岛预计到年底将迎来 150 万人次游客。

India is the largest source of tourists with 200,310 arrivals, followed by Russia with 132,300, latest data from the Sri Lanka Development Authority showed.

斯里兰卡发展局的最新数据显示，印度是最大的游客来源国，有 200,310 人次入境，其次是俄罗斯，有 132,300 人次。

Sri Lanka earned $1.3 billion from tourism in the first eight months of 2023, up from $833 million dollars during the same period last year, according to the central bank.

据央行数据，2023 年前 8 个月，斯里兰卡旅游业收入 13 亿美元，高于去年同期的 8.33 亿美元。

item.title: 折扣电商公司拼多多创始人跻身中国富豪榜
item.description:
The founder of PDD Holdings (PDD.O) saw his wealth swell by $13.8 billion in a year, as a slowing global economy drove more shoppers to the Chinese company's discount e-commerce platforms Temu and Pinduoduo, an annual rich list showed on Tuesday.

周二公布的年度富豪榜显示，拼多多控股(PDD.O)创始人的财富在一年内增加了 138 亿美元，因为全球经济放缓促使更多消费者前往这家中国公司的折扣电子商务平台特木和拼多多。

Colin Huang, who founded PDD in 2015 and stepped down as CEO in 2020, was the fastest riser in this year's Hurun Rich List, leaping seven places to be ranked China's third richest man with a $37.2 billion fortune. It also marked the first time he had broken into the top 3 ranking.

黄科林于 2015 年创立拼多多，并于 2020 年卸任首席执行官，是今年胡润富豪榜上升最快的人，跃升七位，以 372 亿美元的财富位列中国第三富豪。这也标志着他首次闯入前三名。

The growth of his fortune reflects the changing e-commerce landscape both in China, where consumer confidence remains low after three years of COVID curbs, and abroad where shopping platforms such as Temu and Shein are gaining steam. PDD did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

他财富的增长反映了中国电子商务格局的变化，在中国，经过三年的新冠疫情限制，消费者信心仍然低迷，而在国外，Temu和Shein等购物平台正在蓬勃发展。 PDD 没有立即回应置评请求。

Jack Ma, founder of rival Alibaba (9988.HK) which is currently going through a restructuring and working to fend off competition from the likes of PDD, fell one place from 2022 to 10th spot and the number of Alibaba shareholders on the list fell from 18 last year, to 12 this year.

竞争对手阿里巴巴（9988.HK）的创始人马云目前正在进行重组，并努力抵御来自拼多多等公司的竞争，其排名较 2022 年下降一位至第 10 位，上榜阿里巴巴股东数量也从 2022 年下降了一位。去年是18个，今年是12个。

Richard Liu, who founded e-commerce giant JD.com, also saw his wealth, and that of his wife Zhang Zetian, fall by $6.2 billion since last year to $8.26 billion, according to Hurun's list.

根据胡润百富榜，电商巨头京东的创始人刘强东及其妻子章泽天的财富也自去年以来减少了 62 亿美元，至 82.6 亿美元。

JD.com's shares fell to a record low earlier this month after banks cut its price targets citing a weaker-than-expected recovery in consumer spending.

本月早些时候，银行以消费者支出复苏弱于预期为由下调了价格目标，京东股价跌至历史新低。

"Going global has been one of the key sources of growth this year," said Rupert Hoogewerf, Hurun Report Chairman and Chief Researcher, citing PDD's Temu, ByteDance's short video platform TikTok and ultra-fast fashion brand Shein as examples.

胡润百富董事长兼首席研究员胡润表示，“出海是今年的主要增长源之一。”他以拼多多旗下Temu、字节跳动旗下短视频平台TikTok和超快时尚品牌Shein为例表示。

The founder of bottled water brand Nongfu Spring, Zhong Shanshan, retained his first place for the third year running on the list with a $62 billion fortune while Pony Ma, founder of social media and gaming giant Tencent (0700.HK) was second with $38.6 billion.

瓶装水品牌农夫山泉的创始人钟珊珊以 620 亿美元的财富连续第三年蝉联榜首，社交媒体和游戏巨头腾讯（0700.HK）创始人马化腾以 38.6 美元排名第二。十亿。

Hurun also said 179 individuals dropped off this year's list, which ranks China's wealthiest people with a minimum net worth of 5 billion yuan, 15% of which were in real estate, as the sector grapples with a prolonged debt crisis.

胡润还表示，今年有 179 人从净资产不低于 50 亿元人民币的中国最富有人士名单中跌出，其中 15% 从事房地产行业，因为该行业正在努力应对长期的债务危机。

Wang Jianlin, owner of Dalian Wanda Group and once China's richest man, saw his wealth and that of his family fall by $7.3 billion and 57 spots to be placed in 89th position with a $6.47 billion fortune.

大连万达集团老板、曾经的中国首富王健林发现，他和他的家族的财富减少了73亿美元，排名下降了57位，以64.7亿美元的财富排名第89位。

The founder of China Evergrande Group (3333.HK), the world's most indebted property developer, remained on the list at 268 place despite his company's woes, due to dividends paid out in previous years, Hurun said. Hui Ka Yan is currently being investigated over suspected "illegal crimes", Evergrande said last month.

胡润百富表示，尽管公司因前几年派发股息而陷入困境，但全球负债最多的房地产开发商中国恒大集团（3333.HK）的创始人仍位居榜单第268位。恒大上个月表示，许家印目前因涉嫌“违法犯罪”正在接受调查。

Reporting by Casey Hall; editing by Brenda Goh and Miral Fahmy

item.title: 中美官员会晤讨论宏观经济发展
item.description:
Officials from the United States and China on Monday held a two-hour long virtual meeting to discuss domestic and global macroeconomic developments, the U.S. Treasury Department said, calling the meeting "productive and substantive".

美国财政部表示，美国和中国官员周一举行了长达两个小时的虚拟会议，讨论国内和全球宏观经济发展，称会议“富有成效且具有实质性”。

THE TAKE

Ties between the world's two largest economies have been strained in recent years due to a number of issues including Taiwan, the origins of the COVID-19 pandemic, allegations of spying, human rights issues and trade tariffs.

近年来，由于台湾、COVID-19 大流行的起源、间谍指控、人权问题和贸易关税等一系列问题，全球最大的两个经济体之间的关系一直紧张。

Senior officials from both sides have been meeting each other in recent months to lay the ground for an expected meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping in San Francisco in November.

近几个月来，双方高级官员一直在会面，为美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平预计将于 11 月在旧金山举行的会晤奠定基础。

KEY QUOTES

"Today, the United States and the People's Republic of China held the first meeting of the Economic Working Group (EWG), which serves as an ongoing channel to discuss and facilitate progress on bilateral economic policy matters," the Treasury Department said.

美国财政部表示：“今天，美国和中华人民共和国举行了经济工作组（EWG）第一次会议，该会议是讨论双边经济政策问题并促进取得进展的持续渠道。”

China's finance ministry said the two sides had "in-depth, frank and constructive" talks, and also discussed bilateral cooperation in "addressing global challenges".

中国财政部表示，双方进行了“深入、坦诚、建设性”的会谈，并讨论了两国在“应对全球挑战”方面的合作。

Both sides will continue to maintain communication, the ministry said.

外交部表示，双方将继续保持沟通。

U.S. and Chinese officials also raised "areas of concern," statements from the two sides said, without elaborating. The meeting was led by senior officials from the U.S. Treasury Department and China's finance ministry.

双方声明称，美国和中国官员还提出了“令人担忧的领域”，但没有详细说明。会议由美国财政部和中国财政部的高级官员主持。

The EWG was launched last month following U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's trip to Beijing in July. It was launched in parallel with a financial working group, which will hold its first meeting on Wednesday.

专家工作组于美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦 (Janet Yellen ) 7 月访问北京后于上个月成立。它是与金融工作组同时启动的，该工作组将于周三举行第一次会议。

CONTEXT

The economic meeting follows other high-level engagements between the two countries in recent months that have seen visits from U.S. officials to China like Secretary of State Antony Blinken in June, Yellen in July and Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo in August.

这次经济会议是在近几个月两国举行其他高层接触之后举行的，美国官员如六月的国务卿安东尼·布林肯、七月的耶伦和八月的商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多都访问了中国。

More recently, Blinken met Chinese Vice President Han Zheng in New York and U.S. National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan met Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi in Malta. China's top diplomat will travel to the United States later this week to meet Blinken.

最近，布林肯在纽约会见了中国国家副主席韩正，美国国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文在马耳他会见了中国外交部长王毅。中国最高外交官将于本周晚些时候前往美国会见布林肯。
